name: GNRBLEX
detailed_description:
Can you preserve the Gnrblexian Mind Maggot from extinction?
Take on the challenge and preserve both the species, and humanity's fragile sense of self-worth, in this retro-inspired point and click adventure game.

Features:
- Traditional point'n'click gameplay
- Retro-inspired visuals and art
- New, original soundtrack by Joth
- Full voice acting by four talented voice actors
- A dark sense of humour
- Math!
- Extra wriggling

(Game originally released in 2016 as part of the "Monthly AGS" -competition on the Adventure Game Studios -forums)

short_description: Can you keep the Gnrblexian Mind Maggot, a parasitic creature that feeds on human brain energy, from going extinct? Do you want to? ...but why?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Additional Notes: The Adventure Game Studio engine will run on most potatoes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Additional Notes: The Adventure Game Studio engine will run on most potatoes
